data.chText: 自然环境的；生态环境的；有关环境的
data.enText: connected with the natural conditions in which people, animals and plants live; connected with the environment

data.chText: 环境保护组织 / 运动
data.enText: an environmental group/movement (= that aims to improve or protect the natural environment)

data.chText: （影响个体或事物行为或发展的）环境的
data.enText: connected with the conditions that affect the behaviour and development of sb/sth
an environmentally sensitive area (= one that is easily damaged or that contains rare animals, plants, etc.)

means: (影响个体或事物行为或发展的)环境的

tr: concerned with the ecological effects of altering the environment
of or relating to the external conditions or surroundings

value.def: Environmental means concerned with the protection of the natural world of land, sea, air, plants, and animals.

example.tran: 经济和生态环境保护法规

example.ex: ...the environmental claims being made for some products...
example.tran: 要求一些产品注重保护生态环境的主张

example.ex: Environmental groups plan to stage public protests during the conference.
example.tran: 环境保护组织计划在会议期间组织公众抗议活动。

value.tran: 自然环境保护的;生态环境保护的；环保的

example.ex: He veered away from the most environmentally sound option.
example.tran: 他放弃了对环境保护最有利的选择方案。

example.ex: ...the high price of environmentally friendly goods.

value.def: Environmental means relating to or caused by the surroundings in which someone lives or something exists.

example.ex: It protects against environmental hazards such as wind and sun...
example.tran: 它可以保护免受风、太阳等环境因素的危害。

example.ex: The form the human family takes is a response to environmental pressures.
example.tran: 人类的家庭形式是为了应对来自生存环境的压力。

value.tran: 与周围环境有关的;由生存环境引起的
